document.full_text: the obscure true finns party grabbed a share of the government in elections last week after campaigning on the evils of the european union and its bailouts of greece and ireland.
document.title: finland's turn to right sends shivers through euro zone
lines_and_colors: the obscure true finns party grabbed a share of the government in elections last week after campaigning on the evils of the european union and its bailouts of greece and ireland.
